titles: By the King. A proclamation for the further restraint of prophane swearing and cursing, and the better observing of prayer and preaching in His Majesties armies, and the City of Oxford, and in all other parts of the kingdome.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,
notes: With engraving of royal seal at head of document.
Actual place of publication from Wing.
Dated at end: Given at our Court at Oxford, the eighteenth of April. 1644.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Soldiers --  Conduct of life --  Early works to 1800.
